branchCategory.name: CJP
branchCategory.description: <P>SMC's CJP series double acting pin cylinder's compact design minimizes mounting space. To accommodate many design styles, the CJP is available in five mounting styles: basic nose, foot, flange, clevis, and trunnion. An auto switch capable model is also available. Available bore sizes include 6, 10, and 15mm with strokes ranging from 5 to 30mm. Other features include brass panel mounting nuts, stainless steel piston rod, and brass bodies. </P>

branchItem.name: CJP, Pin Cylinder, Single Acting, Spring Return
branchItem.description: <P>SMC's CJP series double acting pin cylinder's compact design minimizes mounting space. To accommodate many design styles, the CJP is available in five mounting styles: basic nose, foot, flange, clevis, and trunnion. An auto switch capable model is also available. Available bore sizes include 6, 10, and 15mm with strokes ranging from 5 to 30mm. Other features include brass panel mounting nuts, stainless steel piston rod, and brass bodies. </P>

branchItem.name: CJP/CJP2 Accessory, Rod End Nut
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's CJP series add on rod end jam nut.</p>

branchItem.name: CJP Accessory, Mounting Nut
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's CJP series add on mounting jam nut.</p>
